channel.title: Mike McDerment - Marketing Metrics and the Systems you need to Measure Them
channel.description:
Here is a video with Mike McDerment (CEO of Freshbooks) presenting how to make your own marketing database, and telling us not to rely on third party services for our marketing data.
> **If this person turns out to be our best customer, we want to know where they came from.** > [Marketing Metrics and the Systems you need to Measure Them][1]
[1]: http://vimeo.com/10733370
